question: The app named "e-Ganna" which was launched by the Uttar Pradesh government, is associated with which of the following?
explanation: The app named "e-Ganna" which was launched by the Uttar Pradesh government is associated with the Sugarcane industry. The main objective of the app is the strengthening of the sugarcane development societies by nullifying the cane mafia and middlemen. It will monitor the sugarcane supply by farmers to mills.
